entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
